oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A list of the |xam and proper names of stones and gemstones, given by Dia!kwain at the Philadelphia Exhibition. The Bushman names for a few Stones were given by Dia!kwain (L V.-20. 5574 and 5575), and by lhan=kasso (L VIII.-21. 7818, 7834). 1) Date on p.5573v: pages taken down at the Philadelphia Exhibition (on 29 November 1875 with Dia!kwain), 2) pp.5573v-5574v: see Parts of the ostrich not to be eaten by children, 3) This story is found in Book V-20.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The names of stones
